import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { useState } from 'react' import './productitem.scss' import ProductItemHeader from '../Product-item/ProductItemHeader/ProductItemHeader.component' import ProductItemSlider from '../../ProductItemComponents/Product-item-slider/ProductItemSlider.component' import ProductItemColors from '../../ProductItemComponents/Product-item-colors/Product-item-colors.component' import ProductItemData from '../../ProductItemComponents/Product-item-data/ProductItemData.component' import ProductItemWarranty from '../../ProductItemComponents/Product-item-warranty/ProductItemWarranty.component' const ProductItem = () => { const productDetails = { capacity: '120l', dimensions: ['500', '950', '550'], mass: ['17', '120'], material: ['galvanized steel sheet - fireproof', 'EN-840'], security: ['powder coating with FreiLacke paints', 'ral color palette'], availableColours: ['all colors herer'], sticker: 'Custom sticker' } const [currentProduct, changeProduct] = useState([]) let { productId } = useParams(); const handleColorClick = color => { console.log(`wybrany kolor to ${color}`) } return (
) } export default ProductItem;
